body.p: To His Excellency Thos E Bramlette

Your petitioner Peter. Smith (a free man of color) would respectfully represent that on the 6th day of Feby 1864 he was fined ^in the Police Court of Frankfort Ky^ the Sum of $5- for having in his posession a pair of pistols, that said pistols were held by him as security for money loaned by him to one Capt Alexander of the 7th Ky Cavalry. Wherefore he prays that your Excellency will exercise Executive Clemency towards him, and remit so much of said fine as is not due the officers
I certify that the above contains the true statements of the facts in this case
Feby 6th 1864, John R Graham P. J. C f.

Police Ct of Frankfort
To His Excellency
Gov Thos E Bramlette
Petition of Peter Smith (a free man of color)

Remit except fees & costs
Tho E Bramlette
Govr
26th Feby/ 64
